name: SherapyPodcastBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Catch the introduction to Sheri Todd's latest weekly episode of the Sherapy podcast. This skill will play the first 10 minutes of the latest Sherapy podcast release. You can say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" to listen to this and your other news briefings. You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit at anytime. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
